title: Data-Driven Reflective Learning Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: A program for developing data-driven self-reflection and learning strategies based on practical workplace experiences.

learning_goals: Through learning analytics, learners can identify individual language usage patterns and develop improvement plans.
Learners can analyze language-related problems occurring in professional settings through reflective writing and derive solution strategies.
Learners can design collaboration strategies based on an analysis of language competency profiles within teams.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
